Property.Name: Thermal
Property.Description: Active only when thermal is on or off.

Property.Name: Base
Property.Description: Base amount of value. Killing a fireflea will increase this value by 2 at a soft cap of 0x0E. This can be set to a max of 0x1F.

Property.Name: Glow Range
Property.Description: Maximum glow amount to add to the base.

Property.Name: Glow Speed
Property.Description: Number of frames between each flow update.
